name: closefriend
text: The Ray Card is both self-contradictory in date and awesome.

name: anomalous3
text:
I think he means it expires in 2099...
It would be great to have my own credit card...

name: kazad
text: Man you know he just typed in 99 'cause that's the biggest number that will fit there.

name: senseihollywood
text: it was also his jersey number in little league

name: sleaw
text: I want to chubby you but that would ruin your perfect 99.

name: tsolless
text: The temptation was too much, I suppose.

name: epicurus
text: The phrase "non-trivial" portion of my assets has entered my vocabulary due to this. I also like how that is Ray's only reason not to have the teller.

name: deusoma
text: Man understands himself and his weaknesses. "If there's a hottie there, I'm gonna hit on her." His trouble avoidance is to be admired.

name: tekende
text: It does not occur to him to hire a male teller.

name: featurelessvoid
text: But someday he might be tempted to look at that as a challenge

name: petitegitan
text: A comment left by petitegitan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by _cheesekayke, rachel, goodgravy)

name: saint
text:
whoops! my bad!
I've got to use that phrase a lot lately...I'll even screw something up just to use it.

name: zapatos
text: As soon as I find a place that makes me bumper stickers, I will hook you up.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: a non-trivial portion of my assets would be the contents of my fridge.

name: tourach3
text:
three beers (two of them unopened), a couple store-brand 'kraft' singles, and a bottle of mustard?
that would be mine
and yes, the beers are about the only thing that would be considered a nontrivial portion of my assets

name: tellumo
text: Why do you store opened beer in your fridge? I mean, once you've opened that sucker you pretty much have to finish in that sitting. It's like vodka; it goes bad once it's opened.

name: odei
text: If you put wine in the fridge, does it stop it from turning alcoholic?

name: tellumo
text: Well, it only turns into alcohol if you let it sit.

name: mangtastic
text:
I am telling you from now, one year in the future, that storing bottled wine will not keep it from being alcoholic. The ethanol is already in the bottle, and cooling it will not make the alcohol disappear.
However, in the process of winemaking, yeast activity is retarded by cooler temperatures. I can see how there may be some confusion. I'm not sure which you were referring to in your comment, either.

I am pretty sure this comment is totally pointless and basically helps none. This is fine by me.

name: tellumo
text: Sorry, like I said: Arrested Development reference .

name: mangtastic
text:
I love Arrested Development, and I understood your reference.

Odei, on the other hand, seemed fairly genuine in his question.

name: mattfish
text: what the hell are you talking about, are you trying to be helpful or sarcastic?

name: tellumo
text: It's an Arrested Development reference .

name: perilon
text: A statue of Krishna and Radha from Bangladesh, and a mostly-empty bottle of CVS "Spectravite" brand multivitamins.

name: biddlebubbly
text: Q?

name: rotating-dog
text: A!

name: riazm
text:
Quentin

Or maybe Quintin.

name: straw
text: Every time.

name: cousinted
text: That picture is the perfect summary of Ray's financial success.

name: postblank
text: Hey Beef, I just started a new business venture, completely on accident!

name: connellingus
text: I wonder why Ray needed a stunt man for his "The Rock Star Died at 27" party .

name: mikebox
text: Beef's nails are always chewed down to the bottom.

name: stuart
text: Astute!

name: mygoodfriend
text: "Every time." brings all the laughs to the yard.

name: apocowarg
text: Roast Beef imagines Ray would apologize while slipping on a pile of his own money.

name: dusty
text: I love the double meaning that this strip pulls off with that line. Is beef talking about the picture on the card, or Ray's situation in life?

name: thegrayhoodie
text: I love Ray's picture on the credit card.  He is totally livin the life.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: His picture proves that he falls ass0end into money. Figurativly AND literally.

name: ggvaidya
text:
"Life is freedom. Try it out."

What a great philosophy!

name: senatorexlax
text: Ass in your pants has really made life freedom for Ray.

name: randyjohnson
text:
One of the comics that makes me laught out loud.
Because of the "The Ray Card. For Ray, By Ray. Every time" & "Whoops! My bad!"

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Mr. Bear: Au revoir to the spring lamb.

name: lawbot
text: Surely this is the next thing in credit card marketing.

name: tekende
text: Ray thinks slipping on money merits a "whoops"

name: coldfrog
text: So no one else thought the idea here was that Ray was so tacky and shameless that he made a credit card that speaks when held the right way?  Because that is the thing that I thought.

name: mangtastic
text: I thought it was Roast Beef speaking in place of the picture of ray on the card, as evident by the smaller font size.
